p.s: The given scene is an excerpt from the drama The Hate U Give, released in 2018.
In the scene at hand Chris meets Starr, his girlfriend in school.
This scene is situated in the beginning of the movie, more precisely: This is the first time we get to see Chris and experience that he is her boyfriend.
The given sequence begins with Chris dancing in the hallway.
He is smiling and greeting students in the hallway while slowly walking towards Starr.
Until Chris reaches Starr, we can hear music, desribingdescribing how the person singing, can't stop starring at their ocean eyes.
Then he sees Starr and walks up to her, while she is turned with her back against him.
Starr is preparing her books for the next lesson and isn't smiling to that time.
This changes when Chris puts his earphones on Starr and makes her listen to rap.
After listening for a short period of time, she smiles and hands the earphones back to Chris, who takes them back and now, stands next to Starr.
They talk about their six months long relationship.
Obviously, it isn't going well, since Chris is clueless what he needs to do, to finally get close to her.
Throughout their whole conversation neither Chris nor Starr is smiling.
This changes when Chris decides ot start dancing in the middle of the hallway, which makes Starr giggle and both of them are smiling again.
The given scene ends with Starr going up to Chris, taking his hand and leaving in a room alone with him.
This scene shows their their behaviour and outer appearance being completely different, but still belonging together.
This is because they both seem to exactly know, how to make the other person happy, even when they don't feel like smiling.
